sense.gloss: burial mound, tomb, tumulus, barrow, gravesite
standing stone, stone signpost, roadside stone statue
shell heap, shell mound, kitchen midden
double grave of lovers who died together
mound covering reverently buried old brushes

r_ele.r: てづかおさむぶんかしょう

sdata.j: ↑手塚↑↓てづか↓↑治虫↑↓おさむ↓の↑本↑↓ほん↓を１↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓くらい↑貸↑↓か↓してくれますか。
sdata.e: Will you lend me the books by Osame Tezuka for about a week?

sdata.j: ↑宝塚↑↓たからづか↓でショーを↑見物↑↓けんぶつ↓しましたか。
sdata.e: Did you see the show at Takarazuka?

sdata.j: ↑高↑↓こう↓↑松塚↑↓まつづか↓↑古墳↑↓こふん↓は、↑奈良↑↓なら↓↑県↑↓けん↓↑明日香↑↓あすか↓↑村↑↓むら↓に↑存在↑↓そんざい↓する↑古墳↑↓こふん↓。
sdata.e: The Takamatuzuka burial mound is located in Nara prefecture, Asukamura.

words.gloss: shell heap, shell mound, kitchen midden
